flavorText: They move in a synchronized swarm, turning entire squads into heaps of bloody rags and bones in an instant.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie bewegen sich in einem synchronen Schwarm und verwandeln ganze Trupps im Handumdrehen in blutige Fetzen und Knochen.
foreignData.name: Flitzender Remasuri
foreignData.text: Remasuri-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Eile. (Sie können angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Se mueven como un enjambre sincronizado, convirtiendo escuadrones enteros en pilas de harapos sanguinolentos y huesos en un instante.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado esfumado
foreignData.text: Las criaturas Fragmentado que controlas tienen la habilidad de prisa. (Pueden atacar y {T} tan pronto como entren bajo tu control.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ils manœuvrent à la manière d'un essaim synchronisé, transformant en un instant un peloton entier en pulpe sanguinolente.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde flou
foreignData.text: Les créatures Slivoïde que vous contrôlez ont la célérité. (Elles peuvent attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elles arrivent sous votre contrôle.)

foreignData.flavorText: Si muovono come uno sciame sincronizzato, trasformando all'istante interi plotoni in mucchi di stracci e ossa.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Sfocato
foreignData.text: Le creature Tramutante che controlli hanno rapidità. (Possono attaccare e {T} non appena entrano sotto il tuo controllo.)

foreignData.flavorText: 彼らは統制のとれた集団行動をとり、瞬時に部隊全体を血にまみれた骨とボロ切れの山に変えてしまう。
foreignData.name: 収差スリヴァー
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするスリヴァー・クリーチャーは速攻を持つ。（それらはあなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}したりできる。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: 놈들이 대오를 맞추어 달려들자 분대 전체가 순식간에 핏덩이로 변했다.
foreignData.name: 찰나 슬리버
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 슬리버 생물들은 신속 능력을 가진다. (그 생물들은 당신의 조종하에 들어오자마자 공격하거나 {T}할 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Eles se movem como um enxame sincronizado e, num instante, pelotões inteiros são transformados em ossos e farrapos ensanguentados.
foreignData.name: Fractius do Borrão
foreignData.text: As criaturas do tipo Fractius que você controla têm ímpeto. (Elas podem atacar e {T} assim que entram sob seu controle.)

foreignData.flavorText: Они движутся слаженным строем, вмиг превращая целые эскадроны в груды окровавленных костей и тряпья.
foreignData.name: Стремительная Щепка
foreignData.text: Существа-Щепки под вашим контролем имеют Ускорение. (Они могут атаковать и {T}, как только они попадают под ваш контроль.)

foreignData.flavorText: 他们会同步地成群移动，瞬间将整队人马变成一堆堆的血腥破布和骨头。
foreignData.name: 迅影裂片妖
foreignData.text: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有敏捷异能。（它们受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）

foreignData.flavorText: 他們會同步地成群移動，瞬間將整隊人馬變成一堆堆的血腥破布和骨頭。
foreignData.name: 迅影裂片妖
foreignData.text: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有敏捷異能。（它們受你操控時便能攻擊與{T}。）

name: Blur Sliver
originalText: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

rulings.text: If Blur Sliver leaves the battlefield during combat, any attacking Sliver creatures that came under your control this turn will continue to attack, even though they will no longer have haste.

If you change the creature type of a Sliver you control so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures you control.

Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.

text: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
